description.zh-cn: 维吾尔族异见人士，八九学运的学生领袖之一。六四事件后被中华人民共和国政府通缉，后流亡并定居台湾，现为政治评论家。
description.en: A Uyghur dissident and one of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests. He was placed on the most-wanted list by the government of the People's Republic of China after the June 4th incident. He later went into exile and settled in Taiwan, where he is now a political commentator.

nodes.id: 北京高校学生自治联合会

zh-cn: 北京高校学生自治联合会

description.zh-cn: 1989年天安门学生运动期间由北京多所高校学生组成的自治联合组织。
description.en: An autonomous joint organization formed by students from several universities in Beijing during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个独派政党。
description.en: An independence-leaning political party in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾籍人士，吾尔开希的妻子。
description.en: Taiwanese individual, wife of Wu'erkaixi.

description.zh-cn: 1989年在中国北京发生的一系列由学生主导的民主抗议活动，最终被政府以武力清场结束。
description.en: A series of student-led pro-democracy protests that took place in Beijing, China in 1989, which ended with a violent crackdown by the government.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所公立师范类大学。
description.en: A public normal university located in Beijing, China.

en: Human Rights Promotion Committee of the Legislative Yuan

description.zh-cn: 中华民国立法院下设的委员会。
description.en: A committee under the Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在救援六四事件后被中国政府通缉的民运人士的秘密行动。
description.en: A covert operation to rescue pro-democracy activists wanted by the Chinese government after the Tiananmen Square protests.

nodes.id: 北京师范大学学生自治会

zh-cn: 北京师范大学学生自治会
en: Beijing Normal University Students' Autonomous Association

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理，在六四事件中持强硬立场。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He held a hardline stance during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 八九学运的学生领袖之一。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 八九学运的学生领袖之一。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 北京市人民政府下设的负责公共安全事务的部门。
description.en: The department under the Beijing Municipal People's Government responsible for public security affairs.

description.zh-cn: 一个由六四事件后流亡海外的民运人士创建的政治组织。
description.en: A political organization founded by pro-democracy activists exiled after the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治学者、异见人士。
description.en: Chinese political scientist and dissident.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任台中市市长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former mayor of Taichung.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央国家行政机关。
description.en: The central state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

en: Public Security Police Force of Macau

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任监察院院长。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former President of the Control Yuan.

en: Occupy Central with Love and Peace

nodes.id: 为自由而自首：吾尔开希的流亡笔记

zh-cn: 为自由而自首：吾尔开希的流亡笔记

description.zh-cn: 吾尔开希撰写的书籍，记录其流亡生涯。
description.en: A book written by Wu'erkaixi chronicling his life in exile.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一家出版社。
description.en: A publishing house in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 1994年上映的香港电影。
description.en: A Hong Kong film released in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 八九学运的学生领袖之一。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 教育系一年级本科生肄业。
description.en: Dropped out as a first-year undergraduate student in the Department of Education.

description.zh-cn: 进修。
description.en: Advanced studies.

description.zh-cn: 进修。
description.en: Advanced studies.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要学生领袖，在八九学运中发挥了重要作用，例如发起绝食抗议。
description.en: As a key student leader, he played an important role in the 1989 student movement, such as initiating hunger strikes.

relationships.target: 北京师范大学学生自治会
北京高校学生自治联合会

description.zh-cn: 1989年4月21日，吾尔开希宣布成立“北京市临学联”，该组织后于25日改名为“北京高校学生自治联合会”。
description.en: On April 21, 1989, Wu'erkaixi announced the establishment of the 'Beijing Provisional Students' Federation', which was renamed the 'Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation' on the 25th.

relationships.target: 北京高校学生自治联合会

description.zh-cn: 在1989年5月18日与时任国务院总理李鹏的会面中，吾尔开希当面打断其发言，双方立场对立。
description.en: During a meeting with then-Premier Li Peng on May 18, 1989, Wu'erkaixi interrupted his speech, highlighting their opposing stances.

description.zh-cn: 在学运期间，因主张从天安门广场东移等问题与柴玲等激进派产生争执，而被学运组织进一步边缘化。
description.en: During the student movement, he had disputes with radical members like Chai Ling over issues such as advocating for moving the protest east from Tiananmen Square, which led to his further marginalization within the movement's organization.

description.zh-cn: 在学运期间，因主张从天安门广场东移等问题与李禄等激进派产生争执，而被学运组织进一步边缘化。
description.en: During the student movement, he had disputes with radical members like Li Lu over issues such as advocating for moving the protest east from Tiananmen Square, which led to his further marginalization within the movement's organization.

description.zh-cn: 将吾尔开希列为21名高自联头头和骨干之一进行通缉。
description.en: Listed Wu'erkaixi as one of the 21 key leaders and core members of the 'Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation' on its wanted list.

description.zh-cn: 协助吾尔开希经香港逃亡至法国。
description.en: Assisted Wu'erkaixi in escaping to France via Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 时任台中市市长的张温鹰欢迎吾尔开希入籍台中市，并亲自向其颁发中华民国国民身份证。
description.en: As the then-Mayor of Taichung, Chang Wen-ying welcomed Wu'erkaixi's naturalization in Taichung City and personally issued him a Republic of China National Identification Card.

description.zh-cn: 试图进入澳门向中国内地自首时，被澳门治安警察局根据《内部保安纲要法》拒绝入境。
description.en: When attempting to enter Macau to surrender to mainland Chinese authorities, he was denied entry by the Public Security Police Force of Macau under the Internal Security Framework Law.

description.zh-cn: 因试图闯入位于东京的中国驻日大使馆而被日本警方逮捕，两日后获释。
description.en: He was arrested by Japanese police for attempting to break into the Chinese Embassy in Tokyo and was released two days later.

description.zh-cn: 多次被香港入境处拒绝入境或遣返。2011年欲赴港参加司徒华丧礼被拒；2013年在香港转机时试图自首被遣返台湾。
description.en: Was denied entry or deported by the Hong Kong Immigration Department on multiple occasions. In 2011, he was denied entry when trying to attend Szeto Wah's funeral; in 2013, he was deported to Taiwan after attempting to surrender during a transit in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 到太阳花学运现场声援学生，并发表讲话。
description.en: Visited the site of the Sunflower Student Movement to support the students and deliver a speech.

description.zh-cn: 在太阳花学运期间，批评时任总统马英九破坏民主。
description.en: During the Sunflower Student Movement, he criticized then-President Ma Ying-jeou for undermining democracy.

description.zh-cn: 就太阳花学运批评时任监察院院长王建煊，并要求其辞职。
description.en: Regarding the Sunflower Student Movement, he criticized then-President of the Control Yuan Wang Chien-shien and called for his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 在台北举行的声援香港占领行动晚会上到场支持。
description.en: Attended a rally in Taipei to show support for the Occupy Central movement in Hong Kong.

relationships.target: 为自由而自首：吾尔开希的流亡笔记

description.zh-cn: 作者。
description.en: Author.

relationships.target: 为自由而自首：吾尔开希的流亡笔记

description.zh-cn: 出版社。
description.en: Publisher.

description.zh-cn: 电影台词中提及吾尔开希曾搭乘同一艘偷渡船到美国。
description.en: A line in the movie mentions that Wu'erkaixi took the same smuggling boat to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国民运人士和六四事件被通缉的学生领袖，持续反对中华人民共和国政府的政治体制，并多次尝试闯关回国向中共自首以表达抗议。
description.en: As a Chinese pro-democracy activist and a wanted student leader from the June 4th Incident, he has consistently opposed the political system of the People's Republic of China and has made multiple attempts to enter the country to surrender to the CCP as a form of protest.

description.zh-cn: 同为八九学运的学生领袖，共同参与运动的组织和发起。
description.en: Fellow student leaders of the 1989 student movement, they jointly participated in organizing and initiating the movement.

description.zh-cn: 曾批评时任总统陈水扁“宛如共产党”。
description.en: Once criticized then-President Chen Shui-bian as being 'just like the Communist Party'.
